title: Implement Project Import Functionality
description: The system currently lacks the ability to import projects. This task involves implementing a feature to import a project, including its test cases and other rich content. This is critical for initializing the system with existing data.
acceptance_criteria: UI provides an 'Import Project' button on the project list page.
Supports importing a JSON file containing project metadata and test cases.
Validates the imported JSON against a defined schema.
Successfully saves the Project, associated Test Suites, and Test Cases to the database.
Redirects the user to the newly imported Project Detail page upon success.

unit: Create 'importParser.test.ts': Test JSON parsing logic and schema validation.
Test handling of malformed JSON or missing required fields.
integration: Create API route tests for 'POST /api/projects/import': Verify database insertions for Project and TestCases.
e2e: Playwright test: User clicks 'Import', uploads a valid JSON file, and sees the new project in the list.
